Producer: Noah Pink, Christopher D'Elia, Giancarlo Esposito, Michael Klein, Lawreen E. Kayl
Production Co: Quiet Hand Films, Dobre Films, Lighthouse Pictures, Great Point Media, Weedon Media
Rating: R (Language Throughout|Disturbing and Violent Content|Brief Drug Use|Suicides)
Synopsis: A reality TV host and a greedy network executive launch a terrifying new program that exploits the on-camera deaths of its players.
Title: This Is Your Death
